# Plot {#plot}

Equation \@ref(eq:bmi) in section \@ref(table) shows the formula of body mass index (BMI).
Also see Fig. \@ref(fig:fig1) and Table \@ref(tab:tbl1).

```{r fig1, fig.cap=CAPTION}
CAPTION <- "Height vs. weight.  "
plot(women)
```

# Table {#table}

<!-- Equation ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  -->
\begin{equation}

  BMI = \frac{weight~[cm]}{(height~[cm])^2}
  (\#eq:bmi)

\end{equation}
<!-- ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  -->

```{r tbl1}
knitr::kable(women, caption = "Dataset 'women'.")
```
